services.servicesDescription: We offer a powerful suite of B2B tools...
services.centralizedDescription: Access a wide range of wholesale products directly from trusted manufacturers across Uzbekistan and neighboring countries.
services.crmDescription: Digitize your sales process with a CRM designed for B2B operations. Track orders, manage clients, and automate communications.
services.servicesIntro: At SilkLinExpo, we go beyond connecting buyers and sellers — we provide an integrated digital infrastructure for efficient, reliable, and scalable B2B trading in Central Asia and beyond.

process.signUpDesc: Register as a manufacturer, intermediary, or wholesale buyer to access the platform.
process.listProductsDesc: Create product listings or place sourcing requests to connect with trusted trading partners.
process.manageCommunicateDesc: Use the built-in CRM to track requests, manage deals, and stay in touch with clients.
process.completeDealsDesc: Choose logistics and declaration options, confirm operations, and build long-term partnerships.

team.teamDescription: Our team combines a unique skill set in digital marketing, software development, and international trade.

manufacturers.raxatDescription: LOTTE Raxat is one of the largest chocolate and confectionery manufacturers in Kazakhstan.
manufacturers.noManufacturersFound: No manufacturers found in partner countries.
manufacturers.raxatCompanyDescription: LOTTE Raxat is a leading confectionery manufacturer in Kazakhstan, offering over 400 products including chocolate, biscuits, and candies. Established in 1942 and now part of South Korea’s LOTTE Group, it exports to the CIS, Europe, the USA, and China.

testimonials.testimonial1: Through SilkLinExpo, we established great partnerships with manufacturers from Uzbekistan.
testimonials.testimonial2: The platform significantly increased our export volume.
testimonials.testimonial3: A very convenient and reliable B2B marketplace.
testimonials.testimonial1Text: SilkLinExpo helped us find a reliable logistics partner and increased our wholesale sales in 2 weeks.
testimonials.testimonial2Text: Declaration agents and order tracking made cross-border trade much easier.
testimonials.testimonial3Text: High-quality products — Flags, exceptional capabilities, programs for birthdays and occasions still remain key on paper.

pricing.bestPricingPlanDesc: At SilkLinExpo, choose the perfect plan tailored to your business needs. Each plan is designed to ensure your B2B trading success.
pricing.basicPlanDesc: Perfect for new sellers, small manufacturers, or beginners in B2B trading.
pricing.standardPlanDesc: For growing teams and intermediaries managing regular trading operations.
pricing.premiumPlanDesc: Built for exporters, wholesalers, and large-scale operations managing complex B2B deals.

features.warehouseStorage1Month: Warehouse Storage for Products up to 1 Month
features.priorityAccess: Priority Access to Logistics and Declaration Agents
features.outletListing: Outlet Product Listing Service (bulk clearance sales)
features.buyerInsights: Buyer Activity Insights and Regional Market Data
features.accountManager: Dedicated Account Manager and Priority Support

meta.pageDescription: Discover thousands of products in Central Asia's largest B2B marketplace. Textiles, food, and industrial products from verified manufacturers.
meta.keywords: B2B marketplace, products, manufacturers, export, import, textiles, Central Asia

homepage.connect: Connect with manufacturers across Central Asia
homepage.description: SilkLinExpo is a multilingual B2B marketplace connecting manufacturers and intermediaries in the CIS region. Simplify your import, export, and wholesale trading business today.

dashboard.welcomeMessage: Manage your platform and track business activity

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We are ready to assist you with all your B2B marketplace needs. Our team is prepared to help with product inquiries, partnership opportunities, and technical support.

newsletter.title: Get Everything for Just $59!
newsletter.description: With our wide range, creating and transforming designs comes naturally. Forget coding and enjoy our themes.

sections.declarationDescription: We connect businesses with certified customs declaration agents to process legal documentation for cross-border trade. The service is available for a negotiated fee based on shipment complexity.
sections.logisticsDescription: Benefit from partnerships with reliable logistics companies offering efficient local and international delivery services. Logistics services are provided for a specific service fee based on route, volume, and agreement terms.
sections.promotionDescription: Promote your products through homepage placement and carousel banners for a specific advertising fee. This promotion helps reach verified B2B buyers and boosts brand visibility on the platform.
sections.aiChatbotDescription: An AI-powered chatbot is available 24/7 to assist with product information, platform navigation, order support, and general inquiries, enhancing the user experience for both buyers and sellers.
sections.paymentDescription: We support secure, fast transactions through integrated payment gateways, including widely used platforms in Uzbekistan and the CIS region.
